casebody.data:
PARAMOUNT RX, INC.
v.
Robert E. DUGGAN and Agelity, Inc. No. 376A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 24, 2016. Christopher Jones, Raleigh, for Paramount Rx, Inc. Leslie C. Packer, Raleigh, for Duggan, Robert E., et al. James Michael Weiss, for Duggan, Robert E., et al. Amanda G. Ray, Raleigh, for Paramount Rx, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 24th of February 2016 to Stay the Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of February 2016."
